channel.title: Need some codes or tuts
channel.description: My server is mainly testscape, and for sum reason it crashes...alot, then i get 20-30 ppl yelling at me, does ne1 have an autosave code? or has anyone figured out why the testscape source code does crash soooo often? ne1??? even a code that kicks every1 every 5 minutes or so wud be nice, then it wud save for em right? then thye would not lost all their stuff when it crashes.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2006, 02:12:59 AM[/size][hr]bump...

item.title: Need some codes or tuts

could a 100g pc can hold 70 people?

item.title: Need some codes or tuts

item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

yeah set your limit to like 20 people, suprisign you get so many crashes, my server has like 3 hour uptimes with no crashes

item.description:

ya mine to… and the client limit is at 25, and it still gets around 30 ppl

item.title: Need some codes or tuts
item.dc:creator: @tim_moughtin tim_moughtin
item.description:
@tim_moughtin wrote:

[quote=“dracar, post:1, topic:39918”]My server is mainly testscape, and for sum reason it crashes…alot, then i get 20-30 ppl yelling at me, does ne1 have an autosave code? or has anyone figured out why the testscape source code does crash soooo often? ne1??? even a code that kicks every1 every 5 minutes or so wud be nice, then it wud save for em right? then thye would not lost all their stuff when it crashes.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2006, 02:12:59 AM[/size][hr]bump…[/quote]a typical problem is that your CPU cant hold more than 30 people (like mine) as soon as your CPU hits 100% yopur server will crash, as a testscape server owner myself, i recomend you put a maxclient limit to 20 and as for the regular crashes dont get me started! my server seems to crash every 4 minutes

Read full topic
